game.name: Age of Mythology: Retold
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 수상 경력에 빛나는 Age of Empires 프랜차이즈의 제작진이 선보이는 Age of Mythology: Retold는 역사를 넘어 신, 괴물, 인간이 충돌하는 신화 시대로 이어집니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as mythological Gods and smite your enemies in this award-winning, mythological Real-Time Strategy classic given new life. Wage war across timeless campaigns, fierce skirmishes, and god-powered multiplayer modes.
game.developers: World's Edge, Forgotten Empires, Tantalus Media, CaptureAge, Virtuos Games
